title: Unicode value 0
content:
Hi

Using Python I want to give a glyph a Unicode value of zero as in the '.null' glyph, however if I do:

NewGlyph.unicode = 0

the Unicode value disaperes to ---

How can I apply the Unicode value zero to a glyph using Python?

thanks
author: malcolm

comments.content: Have you checked to see if there is already a glyph with that code? When FontLab refuses to accept a code, that's usually the reason.
